channel.title: culture on João Duarte
channel.description: Recent content in culture on João Duarte

item.title: Software development is a team sport
item.description: It is very common to imagine a software engineer as a solitary genius who likes to work alone, reclusive, and does not need anyone else to solve any problem that may arise. It is true that for some time, computing has attracted people with more introspective personalities. But what has been happening is that the teams that have achieved the greatest long-term success are those that see software development as a team sport.
